title: Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard celebrate their wedding anniversary with a 'heavy makeout sesh'
text:
Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard just celebrated their five-year wedding anniversary. And while they both forgot the date and were reminded by friends and family, that strong love still remains.

The Frozen actress, 39, took to her Instagram on Monday to share not one but two posts dedicated to her husband, 44, as she revealed they both forgot their wedding anniversary but made up for it with a 'heavy makeout sesh.'

'Here's the morning we both got texts from grandma saying 'happy anniversary!' We were both on our way out the door but stopped for a quick hot and heavy make out sesh while Frank stood close like a creeper.'

Happy Anniversary! Kristen Bell took to her Instagram on Monday to share not one but two posts dedicated to her husband Dax Shepard as she revealed they both forgot their wedding anniversary but made up for it with a 'heavy makeout sesh'

Kristen even shared the photo of the action as the two shared a passionate kiss on their driveway while their dog Frank stood right next to them.

She looked adorable as she had her arms wrapped around her other half in a gorgeous Farm Rio dress.

Dax had his dirty blonde hair a bit messy as he leaned into his wife wearing a black jacket and tan pants.

True love: Kristen shared a heartwarming post about her husband along with a cute selfie of the two

But that wasn't all, before the hot and heavy post she made she to share a more heartfelt message to her partner.

'We were reminded by family and friends that at some point last week, it was our 5 year wedding anniversary. In truth, neither of us remember which day. That's because we have been living the celebration of our commitment every moment since,' she started out in the post.

'I find when you are living with gratitude each moment, the dates become irrelevant. To get to wake up next to someone who has put hard work, respectful fights, patience, understanding and gratitude into your relationship is the definition of love. I will never remember the date of our anniversary @daxshepard, and i know you wont either. And that's just one more thing i love about us.'

Perfect pair: Dax and Kristen smile during the launch of the Hello Bello brand in New York back in February

The two met back in 2007 at the Detroit Red Wings hockey game; the two got engaged back in 2009.

In 2012, he publicly thanked his fiancé on Twitter after celebrating 12 years of sobriety, and that next year he welcomed his first child, Lincoln Bell Shepard.

And in that same year they officially tied the knot in a small, private wedding.

Then in 2014, they welcomed their second child Delta.

The two have since been focusing on their own careers, with Kristen filming her final season of The Good Place and Dax focusing on his podcast, the Armchair Expert.
